About This Location

Your League City Fitness Home

Welcome to CKO Kickboxing League City! Our state-of-the-art facility features 40+ heavy bags, professional instructors, and a community that will motivate you every step of the way.

Located in the heart of League City, we're proud to serve the greater Houston area with the best kickboxing and fitness classes in Texas. Whether you're a complete beginner or a seasoned athlete, our welcoming environment and expert coaching will help you achieve your fitness goals.

  • Climate-controlled facility
  • 40+ heavy bags & equipment
  • Certified professional instructors
  • Private showers & changing rooms
Join Our Community
Our Programs

Classes That Deliver Results

All classes include expert instruction, high-energy music, and a supportive community

Kickboxing

Our signature 45-minute HIIT class. Burn up to 1,200 calories while learning real kickboxing techniques.

45 Minutes All Levels
Book Class

Group Fitness

High-intensity circuit training combining strength, cardio, and core work. No bags required.

50 Minutes All Levels
Book Class

Private Training

One-on-one coaching tailored to your specific goals and fitness level. Maximum results, personalized attention.

30-60 Minutes Custom
